oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Connecticut Woman Suffrage Association, January 8, 1914
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Mary A. Smith, Office Secretary, Connecticut Woman Suffrage Association, Hartford, CT, to Mrs. Crozier French, Knoxville, Tenn. January 8, 1914. 1 page. Re: payment for Pankhurst's "Plain Facts About A Great Evil."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Women's suffrage;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Connecticut Woman Suffrage Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
